boardgame.name: Sushi Go!
Суши карты
סושי Go!
迴轉壽司
초밥왕
boardgame.description: In the super-fast sushi card game Sushi Go!, you are eating at a sushi restaurant and trying to grab the best combination of sushi dishes as they whiz by. Score points for collecting the most sushi rolls or making a full set of sashimi. Dip your favorite nigiri in wasabi to triple its value! And once you've eaten it all, finish your meal with all the pudding you've got! But be careful which sushi you allow your friends to take; it might be just what they need to beat you!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Sushi Go! takes the card-drafting mechanism of Fairy Tale and 7 Wonders and distills it into a twenty-minute game that anyone can play. The dynamics of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;draft and pass_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; are brought to the fore, while keeping the rules to a minimum. As you see the first few hands of cards, you must quickly assess the make-up of the round and decide which type of sushi you'll go for. Then, each turn you'll need to weigh which cards to keep and which to pass on. The different scoring combinations allow for some clever plays and nasty blocks. Round to round, you must also keep your eye on the goal of having the most pudding cards at the end of the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Brand New! A portion of the earnings from each sale are donated to St. Jude Children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Research Hospital. Standard shipping to a USA address: $3.95

New in shrink wrap. Canadians will be charge applicable taxes. Orders will be processed the same day and shipped by expedited parcel. You will be charged exact shipping plus $2 for packing material. Shipped from N2B 1J4. Local pickups welcome. Orders may be combined and orders over $150 will be shipped in Canada free or in the US for a $10 flat fee. Orders must be placed at the same time. We ship the day we receive payment!!! We currently only accept PayPal. Our prices are up to 30% or more off US MRSP.

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 2 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: PayPal SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. All orders are shipping Priority Mail. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 3 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange within 3 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.

Gamewright (GMW249) We_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re huge fans of eating sushi here at Gamewright HQ, so it came as little surprise that we instantly fell in love with this _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;delicious_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; sushi-themed card game. Inventor Phil Walker-Harding created a unique and immediately approachable take on _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;card drafting_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; that makes for a game that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s easy to learn, quick to play, and yet engaging for all ages. Just like a great meal at a sushi bar, this game will have you coming back for more time and time again!
